public VertexMemberAttribute(int count, VertexAttribPointerType type)

Parameters

count int

VertexMemberAttribute(int, VertexAttribPointerType, bool) 

public VertexMemberAttribute(int count, VertexAttribPointerType type, bool normalized)

Parameters

count int
type VertexAttribPointerType
normalized bool

Properties

Count

The number of components of Type represented by this vertex attribute member. E.g. a osuTK.Vector2 is represented by 2 osuTK.Graphics.ES30.VertexAttribPointerType.Float components.

public int Count { get; }

Property Value

int

Normalized

Whether this vertex attribute member is normalized. If this is set to true, the member will be mapped to a range of [-1, 1] (signed) or [0, 1] (unsigned) when it is passed to the shader.

public bool Normalized { get; }

Property Value

bool

Type

The type of each component of this vertex attribute member. E.g. a osuTK.Vector2 is represented by 2 osuTK.Graphics.ES30.VertexAttribPointerType.Float components.

public VertexAttribPointerType Type { get; }

Property Value

VertexAttribPointerType
